RelatedSentence: A maker of AR - 15 and other rifles is shuttering a plant in St. Cloud , which employed as many as 115 people , as part of a restructuring at parent Remington Arms Co. The St. Cloud Times reports on the departure of DPMS Panther Arms , which was announced late last week .

A maker of AR - 15 and other rifles is shuttering a plant in St. Cloud , which employed as many as 115 people , as part of a restructuring at parent Remington Arms Co. The St. Cloud Times reports on the departure of DPMS Panther Arms , which was announced late last week .
Remington , which like DPMS is owned by Cerberus Capital 's Freedom Group , is consolidating more manufacturing in Huntsville , Ala .
Remington , which like DPMS is owned by Cerberus Capital 's Freedom Group , is consolidating more manufacturing in Huntsville , Ala .
DPMS was founded in 1985 by Randy Luth in Becker and began as an U.S. Army contractor , making parts for M - 16 rifles and other weapons .
Mark Reilly manages daily and weekly coverage at the Business Journal newsroom .
